mapper.select: SELECT ca.* , c.car_no FROM car_alarm ca left join car_info c on ca.terminal_id = c.terminal_id WHERE ca.handled = 0
SELECT ca.* , c.car_no FROM car_alarm ca left join car_info c on ca.terminal_id = c.terminal_id WHERE ca.handled = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT into car_alarm (id, terminal_id, route_id, latitude, longitude, handled, update_user, update_time) VALUES (#{id},#{terminalId}, #{routeId}, #{latitude, jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{longitude, jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{handled},#{updateUser},#{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT date_format(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as alarmDate, COUNT(*) as alarmNum FROM car_alarm GROUP BY date_format(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY date_format(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d') DESC LIMIT 7
SELECT `status` ,count(`status`) as numOfMisinformation FROM car_alarm GROUP BY `status`
